dict.acceptation: 父亲；祖先；（尤指天主教和东正教的）神父；天父；
成为父亲；创立（新思想）；创造；发明（新方法）；

sent.orig: I would rather lather Father Than Father lather me. When Father lathers He lathers rather free.
sent.trans: 我宁可给法泽尔打肥皂也比法泽尔给我打肥皂好。当法泽尔给我打肥皂时，总是随心所欲。

sent.orig: Azor was the father of Zadok, Zadok the father of AkimAkim the father of Eliud.
sent.trans: 阿左尔是匝多克的父亲，匝多克是阿歆的父亲，阿歆是厄里乌得的父亲。

sent.orig: Be a father to him, but be an indulgent father.
sent.trans: 希望你做他的父亲，慈爱的父亲。

sent.orig: She is very close to her father/She and her father are very close.
sent.trans: 她和父亲的关系很亲密。

sent.orig: He asked his father for the car, but his father said right off that he couldn't have it.
sent.trans: 他向父亲借这辆汽车，但是他父亲直截了当地拒绝了。
